Text: Thank you for the upload.  Nice offering.

Most of these are read by Geoffrey Howard and are of good quality. Lord Hornblower is read by Christian Rodska and also worth listening to. Hornblower in the West Indies is of a poorer quality. I don't recall who does the narration, but it is none of the two mentioned. Thanks a bunch. Hope it stays alive for some time for these are great books especially if you are into the whole napoleonic / navy deal. Ha-h'm. Call all hands to weigh anchor and make sail.
Thx a bunch was looking fore this a long time. great job.
Please seed, I want this torrent so badly!
